headline: Has the Market Gone Too Far in Punishing Block After Recent Slide?
summary: For investors wondering whether Block is a beaten down opportunity or a value trap at current levels, this article walks through what the numbers are really saying about the stock. Despite a sharp long term slide, with the share price down 71.8% over 5 years and 37.8% over the past year, the more recent moves, a 17.0% drop over 30 days and 8.5% over the last week, suggest investor sentiment is still shifting. Recent headlines have focused on Block doubling down on its broader fintech...
